""Currently, we are looking for a SEO Specialist interested in managing our client’s website. We seek a candidate with 3-5 years’ experience crafting and implementing successful SEO strategies, preferably within an agency setting. The ideal individual is an SEO expert, staying abreast of the constantly changing SEO sphere. This role demands a keen analytical approach, prioritizing data, and exceptional communication skills both written and verbal.What You Will Do:- Identifying, reviewing and analysing SEO opportunities for our portfolio of clients.- Conducting SEO website audits.- Creating and implementing strong on-page optimisation strategies.- Creating and implementing off-site optimisation strategies and link analysis.- Developing link building strategies.- Set measurable goals that demonstrate improvement in marketing efforts.- Managing and tracking SEO campaign progress.- Efficiently communicate with other marketing professionals to align goals.- Collaborate with others within the team to manage SEO strategy.- Ensuring the accuracy and excellence of engaging website content, such as blog entries and page descriptions.- Carrying out comprehensive keyword research to identify opportunities.- Analyzing SEO strategies used by competitors- Keeping up to date with the latest developments in search, analytics and digital marketing.Requirements:- 3 – 5 years of experience in successfully developing and executing SEO campaigns.- Understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking methods.- Working knowledge of Moz, Ahrefs, SEMrush and other SEO tools.- Experience with SEO industry programs, such as Google Analytics or Adobe Analytics.- Knowledge of keyword research and data mining tools.- Able to complete competitive analysis of other companies within the industry.- Excellent written and verbal communication skills (email, phone, etc.)- Comfortable analyzing high volumes of data daily- Proficiency with Search Console, MS Office, WordPress and other CMSs- Experience with other aspects of marketing, such as customer growth and promotion, is a plus.- A positive attitude- Able to communicate in English at actively is required- Ability to take ownership over your work.- Willing to work according to Australian time or 6 AM – 3 PM Jakarta Time (9 hours include 1-hour break).Hourly Range: $8.00-$15.00Posted On: February 23, 2024 03:24 UTCCategory: SEOSkills:SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz, Google Search Console, Google Analytics, Search Engine Optimization, SEO Keyword Improve this resume bullet:
""Thank you for advancing to the next stage of our selection process. In this step, we invite you to submit a project demonstrating your skills, creativity, and workflow process. This project will help us evaluate your ability to create engaging multimedia content in alignment with our firm's branding and objectives.Please review the following instructions carefully:We will provide you with a live stream video recording featuring our head Attorney discussing a relevant immigration topic. The live stream is divided in two sections. The first one is a topic presentation and the second is a Q&A segment related to any immigration question the viewers may have. Your deliverables will encompass the following:1. YouTube Video (1 video):- Develop a YouTube video focusing on the topic presentation segment.- Utilize your criteria to determine the most engaging content from the presentation and how to transform it for maximum viewer engagement.- Ensure the video includes an engaging intro/outro and a customized thumbnail.- Enhance viewer engagement and comprehension by incorporating relevant headings, subheadings, or captions or anything you deem necessary.- The final youtube video's duration would ideally be between 10-20 minutes. Please remember, the goal is not to make this shorter by removing substance but to keep it engaging by removing filler.2. Short-Form Content for Instagram and TikTok (2 videos)- Using the Q&A portion, create two short-form content videos tailored for Instagram Reels and TikTok.- Use your best criteria to select the most relevant questions or the ones that would make the most engaging content.- Each video should be visually appealing and aligned with current social media trends of this niche or type of content.- Implement visual elements such as transitions, graphics, effects, captions, etc., to enhance engagement and maintain relevance.3. Static Post / Still Post Content (2 Images):- Based on the topic discussion, produce two still images suitable for posting on Instagram, Facebook, and other social media platforms.- These images should be optimized for a static 1-image post format.- Include compelling information from the video that would resonate with our Facebook audience.The video file provided for this project a great one content-wise. However, if it is possible to find a way to fix the color of the Attorney's sweater, since in the video it appears as a similar color as her skin tone, through color correction or any other visual aid you can do. The video file for this project is found in the following link:[REDACTED_URL] Details:- Ensure all content submissions are original and reflective of your best work.- Submit project files and assets to the provided cloud drive via Upwork Direct Messages.- Optionally, provide a brief overview of your workflow process and creative decisions for each content piece to enhance our understanding of your creative direction.- Feel free to ask as many relevant questions as you may need before or during the project execution to guide your process effectively.Evaluation Process:- Our team will assess your project based on creativity, technical proficiency, alignment with our brand tone and messaging, and overall effectiveness in engaging our target audience.- Deadline: March 1st, 2024We kindly inform you have until March 1st, 2024, to submit your final deliveries. However, if you encounter any issues with the delivery date, please notify us promptly so we can take it into consideration. If you prefer to submit your deliverables before the deadline, feel free to do so; just be sure to notify us accordingly.We deeply appreciate your commitment and effort in completing this project submission. We eagerly anticipate reviewing your work and potentially welcoming you to our team.Budget: $50Posted On: February 23, 2024 03:23 UTCCategory: Video EditingSkills:Video EditingSkills: Video EditingCountry: United States""

""Crafting a well-defined brief for your designer while leaving ample room for creativity is essential. Here’s how you can articulate your business concept and objectives for the logo, setting a clear scope without constraining creativity:"Home It" Logo Design BriefBusiness Overview:"Home It" is revolutionizing the furniture and interior design industry through a unique e-commerce platform. Unlike traditional furniture shopping, we delve into the essence of personalization and customization. Our service allows customers to submit their room layouts, which we then use to match them with top interior designers. These designers create bespoke designs tailored to each customer's individual preferences, transforming their space into a personalized haven. Our mission is to materialize our customers' visions into reality, making their dream home a tangible experience.Objective:The logo should embody the spirit of bespoke interior design and personalization, reflecting our innovative approach to transforming spaces. It must convey sophistication, creativity, and the bespoke nature of our service. The goal is for viewers to immediately grasp that "Home It" is not just about buying furniture; it's about crafting personalized living spaces that echo the customer's unique style and needs.Target Audience:Our target audience includes homeowners and renters ranging from mid-20s to late 50s who appreciate design and are seeking customized solutions for their living spaces. They value quality, uniqueness, and the ability to tailor their environment to reflect their personal taste.Creative Freedom:We encourage creativity and innovation in the design process. The logo should be more than a graphic; it should tell a story and evoke a feeling of home, personalization, and the transformation journey we offer our clients. While we've outlined the essence of our brand, we invite you to bring your own vision and ideas to the forefront.
